Welcome to Siman’s documentation!¶

Contents:

Classes used in siman TODO: 1. Please combine calculate_nbands(), calc_kspacings(), magmom filling in make incar with actualize_set() 2. split make_incar_and_copy_all() into make_incar() and copy_calc_files_to_cluster()

class classes.Calculation(inset=None)[source]¶

Main class of siman. Objects of this class contain all information about first-principles calculation

read_geometry(filename=None)[source]¶

Reads geometrical data from filename file in abinit format

write_geometry(geotype='init', description='', override=False)[source]¶

Writes geometrical data to self.path[“input_geo”]

class classes.CalculationAbinit(inset=None)[source]¶

docstring for CalculationAbinit

class classes.CalculationVasp(inset=None)[source]¶

Methods for calculations made using VASP DFT code

actualize_set()[source]¶

Makes additional processing of set parameters, which also depends on calculation

add_potcar()[source]¶

Should be run for the first calculation only

calc_kspacings(ngkpt=[])[source]¶

Calculates reciprocal vectors and kspacing from ngkpt

calculate_nbands()[source]¶

Should be run after add_potcar()

make_incar_and_copy_all(update)[source]¶

Makes Incar file for current calculation and copy all TO DO: there is no need to send all POSCAR files; It is enothg to send only one. However for rsync its not that crucial

make_run(schedule_system=None)[source]¶

Generate run file

INPUT:
schedule_system -
read_poscar(filename)[source]¶

Read POSCAR file

write_sge_script(input_geofile='header', version=1, option=None, prevcalcver=None, savefile=None, schedule_system=None)[source]¶

Without arguments writes header, else adds sequence of calculatios option - ‘inherit_xred’ - control inheritance, or ‘master’ - run serial on master prevcalcver - ver of previous calc; for first none savefile - ‘cdawx’, where c-charge, d-dos, a- AECCAR, w-wavefile, x-xml schedule_system - type of job scheduling system:’PBS’, ‘SGE’, ‘SLURM’

write_structure(name_of_output_file, type_of_coordinates='dir', option=None, prevcalcver=None, path=None, state='init')[source]¶

Generates POSCAR file type_of_coordinates - ‘direct’ (xred) or ‘cartesian’ (xcart) option -inheritance option prevcalcver - ver of first calc in calc list; for first None state - ‘init’ or ‘end’

class classes.Structure[source]¶

This class includes only structure related information such as primitive vectors, coordinates, forces and so on
